snippet: Even as Mitt Romney increases his attacks on the Obama administration, his measured portrayal of the president himself has frustrated Republicans eager to see the president demonized.
abstract: Some Republicans are frustrated by the fact that Mitt Romney continues to offer a measured portrayal of Pres Obama's personality, despite ratcheting up criticism of his policies.
lead_paragraph: Even as Mitt Romney increases his attacks on the Obama administration, his measured portrayal of the president himself has frustrated Republicans eager to see the president demonized.

headline.seo: On Trail, Romney Avoids Attack on a Likable Obama
headline.main: Critics From Base See Romney Pulling Punches on ‘Nice Guy’ Obama
headline.print_headline: Critics From Base See Romney Pulling Punches on ‘Nice Guy’ Obama
